(Code, in my profile, for Oblitertron, I make it clear that Oblitertron is 
about 40-50 FT, not over 100.  Also, I had no idea Plinti's base was so big 
because of the amount of resources that I thought she had available (making a 
base from scratch), and by sitting on it, I didn't mean top of base, more 
like an angle)
